abstract: The sale, which was first struck last November, was completed on Friday. Even after Universal sells off a third of EMI’s assets, as required by regulators, it will have a market share of 36 percent.
snippet: The sale, which was first struck last November, was completed on Friday. Even after Universal sells off a third of EMI’s assets, as required by regulators, it will have a market share of 36 percent.
lead_paragraph: The Universal Music Group closed on its $1.9 billion acquisition of EMI Music on Friday, a week after receiving regulatory clearance in Europe and the United States and more than 10 months after it first made the deal with Citigroup.

headline.main: Universal Closes on EMI Deal, Becoming, by Far, Biggest of Remaining Big Three
